text: Bledius is a genus of spiny-legged rove beetles in the family Staphylinidae. There are at least 100 described species in Bledius. ==See also== * List of Bledius species ==References== * ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==External links== * Cheng, L. (Ed.). (1976). Marine insects. North- Holland Publishing Company: Amsterdam, The Netherlands. XII, 581 pp. * Frank, H.; Ahn, K.-J. (2011). Coastal Staphylinidae (Coleoptera): A worldwide checklist, biogeography and natural history. ZooKeys. 107: 1-98 Category:Oxytelinae
title: Bledius
